fields.name: Blessing of the Kami
fields.description: Target Friendly Faction, non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model gains a Virtue Token.

fields.name: Prayer of Purification
fields.description: When this model uses its Heal trait, instead of Healing Wounds it may remove an equal number of Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Diseased, Fire, Poison, Spirit Block, or Stunned Markers from the Target.

fields.name: Earthen Rampart Stance
fields.description: This model gains Parry (1) and Friendly models within 2" of this model have Cover until the End Phase or this model Moves.

fields.name: Flame On!
fields.description: Until the End Phase, this model's Melee Weapons gain Fire (

fields.name: Whirlwind Kick
fields.description: This model gains Indomitable (2) and Split Attack until the End Phase. Add 1 additional Attack die to each exchange when using Split Attack until the End Phase.

fields.name: Body of Oak
fields.description: This model gains Armour (X) until the current action is resolved. X cannot be greater than 3.

fields.name: Fists of Iron
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain +X Melee Strength until the current Melee Exchange is resolved. X cannot be greater than 3.

fields.name: Pack Alpha
fields.description: This model gains Order [Monkey](

fields.name: Four Hand Technique
fields.description: This model gains Throw Attack (0) and Throw Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Vivacity
fields.description: Add an activation counter to This Model's Card.

fields.name: Aura of Serenity
fields.description: All non-Soulless models in the Aura or in BtB with a model in the Aura lose Aggressive, may not place dice in Attack, use Special Defences during Melee Exchanges, Target Enemy models with Ki Feats or move through the Aura with a Charge or Run Action.

fields.name: Contemplate Existence
fields.description: Remove all Activation Counters from the Target.

fields.name: Divert Energy
fields.description: Until the End Phase, when this model would roll Damage for a Melee attack, it may instead inflict 1 Wound (Ignoring Tough) and Heal 1 Wound or remove 1 Ki Token from the Enemy model and gain that Ki Token.

fields.name: Foresight
fields.description: After the dice for a Melee Exchange in the Pulse have been rolled and final results determined, you may reallocate Melee dice, choose a different Special Attack or Defence and both players reroll.  The Opponent must keep the same dice allocation and Special Attack or Defence. Any Ki Feats used are still in effect.

fields.name: Time's Favour
fields.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain Slow until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Wasp Punch
fields.description: This model gains Strong until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Crashing Wave Strike
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Faith
fields.description: Target Villager model reduces the cost of all Ki Feats by 1 until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Wall of Water
fields.description: Enemy models treat the Aura as [Difficult, Obscuring, Small] terrain and must pass a Size Challenge Test (6) to enter the Aura.

fields.name: Binding Roots
fields.description: Choose up to X Enemy models within the Pulse's area of effect. Each model chosen becomes Immobilised.

fields.name: Regrowth
fields.description: This model gains Regenerate (2) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Resolve of Rock
fields.description: This model gains Tireless and Construct until the End Phase.

fields.name: Stubbornness of Steel
fields.description: This model gains Rise (3) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Inspiring Shomyo
fields.description: This model gains Leadership [Friendly](

fields.name: Frozen Mountain Fist
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapon gains Sharp (1).  After conducting re-rolls for a Melee Exchange, you may remove this model's highest Defence dice and then add an Attack dice of the same value before determining final results.

fields.name: Iron Arm
fields.description: This model gains Parry (1) and Tough (1) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Flame On
fields.description: Until the End Phase, this model's Melee Attack gains the Fire (

fields.name: Pick Pocket
fields.description: Target Friendly Urchin that is within 2" of an Enemy model. If the Enemy model has an enhancement - equipment card, transfer it to Fai-ginn's card.

fields.name: Subtle Dominance
fields.description: When Target model declares an action it must make a Ki Challenge Test (5), if it fails its activation ends and it loses an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Kiss of the Rose
fields.description: After an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Control Marker. No Melee Exchange takes place, this model does not lose an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Fortune's Favour
fields.description: This model may spend X Ki Tokens to reroll X dice rolled for a test by a model within the Aura, before the final result of the test is determined. Each dice can only be rerolled once as a result of this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Cheat Fate
fields.description: Before a Friendly model would roll a dice for any type of test, spend X. Remove one dice that would be rolled for the test and after other dice have been rolled for the test add a dice with the value of X+1 to the test before determining the final result. X cannot be greater than 5.

fields.name: Misdirection
fields.description: Target model has no ZoC and models may choose not to be considered in BtB with it when declaring and performing their actions.

fields.name: Tax
fields.description: When an Enemy model within the Aura's area of effect uses a Ki Feat or Ki Boost, the cost in Ki Tokens is increased by 1, and this model gains 1 Ki Token.

fields.name: Trade
fields.description: This model gains Channel (1

fields.name: Fumidashi
fields.description: Choose a model completely within a Scenario Zone. That model does not count as being in the zone when calculating Zone Control this turn.

fields.name: Kinjite
fields.description: Choose any Special Attack or Defence. Models within the Aura may not declare use of that Special Ability.

fields.name: Madamada
fields.description: When an Enemy model Moves, in its own activation, into BtB with Target Friendly model, after its Move is complete, Move the Enemy model directly away from the Friendly model until it leaves its ZoC.

fields.name: Lay Makibishi
fields.description: Deploy a Makibishi terrain element template in BtB with this model. Whenever a model without Cloudwalk or Intangible moves into, or starts its movement within the Makibishi terrain element, it must make a Move Challenge Test (8) if it is performing a Charge or Run Action, or Move Challenge Test (7) otherwise. If unsuccessful the model's movement and activation immediately ends.

fields.name: Promo
fields.description: Whenever Target model makes a Fear Test against a Buto model, the Buto gains Terror.

fields.name: Mocking Blow
fields.description: When this model next deals Damage as a result of a Melee Exchange, the Opposing model gains an Impetuous Marker.

fields.name: Here Boy!
fields.description: Place a Friendly Dog model in the Pulse's area of effect into BtB with this model, but not in BtB with an Enemy model or Enemy ZoC

fields.name: Prayer of Healing
fields.description: This model may Target any model within the Aura with its Heal trait.

fields.name: Prayer of Purification
fields.description: When this model uses its Heal trait, instead of Healing Wounds it may instead remove an equal number of Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Fire, Poison, Spirit Block, or Stunned Markers from the Target.

fields.name: Move It!
fields.description: This model's Controller chooses up to 3 other Friendly Ashigaru models within the Pulse's area of effect. Those models immediately perform a Walk up to their Move stat in inches.

fields.name: Sojutsu
fields.description: Target Friendly Ashigaru gains Co-ordinated Attack [Ashigaru] until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Genki
fields.description: This model gains Charging Bonus [Fearless] but loses the Ashigaru Type until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Three Shots Per Minute
fields.description: This model removes all Reload Markers.

fields.name: Force Manipulation
fields.description: When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose 1 of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved: • Ranged Weapon Range Bands become

fields.name: Temporal Barrier
fields.description: While within the Aura, models gain Ranged Defence (2).

fields.name: Time Reversal
fields.description: All other models gain up to 2 Activation Counters to a maximum of 2.

fields.name: Time Skip
fields.description: Remove all Activation Counters from the board.

fields.name: Outmanoeuvre
fields.description: When applying Melee Assist penalties, this model inflicts -2 dice rather than -1 until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

fields.name: Takashi Koryu
fields.description: This model gains Critical Attack (1) until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

fields.name: Tactical Counsel
fields.description: This model's Controller can re-roll the Tactical Roll at the start of any turn.

fields.name: Unify
fields.description: Target Friendly model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.

fields.name: Tactical Master
fields.description: This model gains Command [Friendly](X/8") until the End Phase.

fields.name: Diplomatic Immunity
fields.description: Non-Soulless Enemy models in the Aura and non- Soulless models in BtB with them lose Aggressive, may not place dice in Attack or use Special Defences in a Melee Exchange or Target this model with Ki Feats.

fields.name: Enmity
fields.description: Choose a model descriptor. Target Friendly model gains Vengeance [chosen descriptor] until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Outwit
fields.description: Controller of Target model that just declared a Scenario Action must choose a different actio or may choose another model to activate. That model doesn not lose an Activation Counter if it does not perform an action.

fields.name: Instructional Swipe
fields.description: When a Friendly Prefecture model in the Pulse fails a Fear Test; it instead passes that Test and loses one Wound.

fields.name: Buki Manipulation
fields.description: This model's Buki 23 Weapon gains one of the following until the end of the current Melee Exchange: • Grapple Attack (1) • Slam Attack (1) • Reach • Reduce the cost of any Special Attacks by 1

fields.name: Specialist Knowledge
fields.description: A Friendly Samurai or Ashigaru model in BtB gains the Weighted Tetsubo Enhancement card if permitted.

fields.name: Cleansing Flames
fields.description: Remove all Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Poison, and Spirit Block Markers from models in the Pulse and each model gains a Fire (1) Marker.

fields.name: Summon Ice Kami
fields.description: Summon a Ronin Kami of Reflection by Replacing this model (this model is removed from play).  (You cannot have more models in play than the card has Wound Tracks). If this model was in a Melee Exchange, the Kami can neither be damaged nor deal damage this exchange.

fields.name: Icy Veins
fields.description: Target model gains Fearless, Durable [Ranged], and Slow until the End Phase. If Target is an Enemy, you must succeed in an Opposed Ki Test.

fields.name: Conditioning
fields.description: This model gains Resistance (2) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Dashuhua
fields.description: Models in the Aura gain Cover. Enemy models moving into the Aura gain a Fire (2) Marker. This model cannot use this feat if it has no Ammo Tokens.

fields.name: Fumeiryo
fields.description: Deploy a 50mm base on the table within LoS and 6" of this model. Until the End Phase the area of the base is [Normal, Blocking, Large] terrain. This model cannot use this feat if it has no Ammo Tokens.

fields.name: Inertia
fields.description: When this model makes a successful Ranged Attack this Activation against an Enemy model, push that model 1" directly away from this model.

fields.name: Spin
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become

fields.name: Blizzard
fields.description: All models are in Cover and gain Slow until the End Phase.

fields.name: Cold Shatter

fields.name: Hadori Finish

fields.name: Blade Dedication
fields.description: Choose an Enemy model in the Pulse to gain a Duel Token. 1 Friendly Samurai model in BtB with this model gains the Dedicated Blade Enhancement card, if permitted. This feat may only be successfully used once per game.

fields.name: Be Prepared
fields.description: Choose a Ronin Enhancement-Equipment card not alredy included in the Warband and Attach it to Target Blood Brother model.

fields.name: Swift Executor
fields.description: This model loses Insignificant until the end of this activation. If this model declares a Wait or Scenario Action this activation, it may Walk a distance equal to its Move Statistic before or after the Action.

fields.name: Ki Mirror
fields.description: When a non-Soulless model within 6" becomse the Target of a Ki Feat you may choose a new, valid Target for the Ki Feat, ignoring the feat's Range.

fields.name: Imperial Decree
fields.description: Models in the Aura cannot perform Scenario Actions.

fields.name: Imperial Seal
fields.description: When this model is Targeted with a Ki Feat or Action by an Enemy non-Soulless, non-Insignificant, non-Animal model, the Opposing Player must choose a different valid Target for the Action or Ki Feat. If there is no other legal Target then the Enemy model's action ends. Remove an Activation Counter as normal.

fields.name: Blood Brothers
fields.description: When another Friendly Blood Brother model ends its activation you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.

fields.name: Rivalry
fields.description: Target other Friendly Faction model with Rice Cost equal to this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase

fields.name: Saihai
fields.description: Any Friendly Blood Brother models in the Pulse (including this model) may immediately perform a Walk up to their Move Statistic in inches.

fields.name: Electrify
fields.description: Until the End Phase, when this model Damages or is Damaged by an Enemy model with a Melee Attack, that model gains a Stunned Marker and you may push that model 1" directly away from this model.

fields.name: Sworn Sisters
fields.description: Target other Friendly Princess model gains an Activation Marker.

fields.name: Sister's Succour
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Princess model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route. If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

fields.name: Sisterly Bond
fields.description: Immediately Heal all Friendly Princesses in the Pulse to have the same number of marked Wound boxes as the least Wounded Friendly Princess model.

fields.name: Contemplate No Mind
fields.description: Target loses all Activation Counters. The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift. Add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

fields.name: Rage Against Time

fields.name: Touch the Silence
fields.description: When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, prevent X Wounds. For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers 1 Wound, ignoring Tough.

fields.name: Dark From Light
fields.description: In the Aura: • Satsui models in the Aura gain Spirit (+1). • Non-Void Element models gain Spirit (-1).

fields.name: Scorch the Earth
fields.description: Place the Scorched Earth template in BtB with this model. It is a Terrain element [Difficult, Obscuring, Zero]. Models contacting this Terrain gain a Fire (3) Marker. Remove the Terrain element in the End Phase. Add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

fields.name: Forbidden Censure
fields.description: Target gains a Death Sentence Marker. Choose another Enemy model (that has not been Targeted by this feat this activation) within 3" of the Target and immediately repeat this Ki Feat on the new model, ignoring Range, LoS and Camouflage. The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift. This feat may affect a maximum of X Enemy models in 1 action.

fields.name: Forbidden Force
fields.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (X) until the current activation is complete.

fields.name: Time Spiral
fields.description: This model gains Cloudwalk, Sweep Attack (0), and Unblockable (1) until the end of the current action.

fields.name: Obscured by Umbra
fields.description: This model gains Intangible until the end of the current action.

fields.name: Empower the Void
fields.description: If an Enemy model in the Pulse spends Ki for any reason, add a Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

fields.name: Stronger Than Hate
fields.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model deals Damage in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy non-Satsui model loses an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Unseen Anger
fields.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: The Void Stares Back
fields.description: Target non-Satsui Enemy model which has LoS to this model. Make a Success Level 4 Damage Roll on the Target model. Wounds caused by this Ki Feat ignore Armour. A model can only be targeted by this feat (from any source) once per turn. The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift. If this feat causes any Wounds, add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.

fields.name: Whispers of the Void
fields.description: Use only in the Main Phase. Add 1 to this model's statistics until the current activation is complete. This is considered a Ki Boost.

fields.name: Silence of the Void
fields.description: Use only in the Main Phase. Add 2 to this model's statistics until the End Phase. This is considered a Ki Boost. This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.

fields.name: Time Splice
fields.description: When this model successfully Damages an Opponent in a Melee Exchange, after the Melee Exchange is resolved, Place this model anywhere within 1" of the Enemy model and not in its LoS or within a Spirit Ward Aura (If this is not possible this feat cannot be used). If this model has a remaining Activation Counter after this activation is completed, you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.

fields.name: Hammer Strike
fields.description: This model gains Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Fukku
fields.description: Target Enemy model must succeed at a Size Challenge Test (5) or be placed anywhere in BtB with this model. Immediately begin a Melee Exchange with the Target model. This only removes one Activation Counter

fields.name: Retract

fields.name: Parley
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model's activation ends immediately.

fields.name: Provoke

fields.name: Smite

fields.name: Balance
fields.description: This model gains immune [Prone] until the current activation is resolved.

fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Bleed (

fields.description: This model and Target Friendly model gain Aggressive, Fearless, Resistance (1), and Unstable until the End Phase. This Ki feat cannot be used if this model has no Ammo Tokens.

fields.name: Same's Warning
fields.description: Target model gains Sixth Sense until the End Phase

fields.name: Game Hunter
fields.description: The model's Ranged Weapons gain Sharp (1) untill the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Reel Them In!
fields.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse Damages an Enemy model with a Harpoon Ranged Attack, the Enemy model becomes Prone.

fields.name: Orochi's Visage
fields.description: This model gains Fear (6) and Terror until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Spiritual Conduit
fields.description: Friendly Ito Shisai models within the Aura can use this model as the point of origin for Targeted Ki Feats when this model is not in BtB with or within an Enemy model's ZoC.Use this model to draw LoS and Range for the feat.

fields.name: Snap Shot
fields.description: This model immediately makes a Ranged Attack ignoring Reload markers on this model.

fields.name: Contagious Poison
fields.description: Perform an Opposed Ki test with Target Enemy Model. If successful, that model gains a Poison (2) Marker and a Stun Marker. Regardless of success of the Opposed Ki Test, choose another Enemy model within 3" of the Target and immediately repeat this Ki Feat at no cost on the chosen model, ignoring Range, LoS, and Camouflage. The chosen model is then considered the Target. No model may be affected more than once by this Ki Feat in a turn.

fields.name: Paralyze
fields.description: Target Enemy model becomes Immobilised and gains Slow until the End Phase.

fields.name: Reflexes
fields.description: Move this model directly away from an Enemy model in BtB until it leaves its ZoC. After moving, this model must use Bodyguard. If it cannot, it doesn't Move.

fields.name: Orochi's Prayer
fields.description: Models within the Pulse gain a Poison (2) Marker.

fields.name: Tail Whip
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model or a Friendly Faction Shisai model in BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker. A model may only gain one Stunned Marker per activation as a result of this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Slither
fields.description: This model gains Agile and Evasive until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Far Shot
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become

fields.name: Accelerate Venom
fields.description: Target Enemy model removes its highest value Poison Marker and suffers a number of Wounds equal to the removed Poison Marker's value.

fields.name: Haunting Vision
fields.description: This model gains Terror until the End Phase.

fields.name: Acquisition
fields.description: This model may use any Special Attacks, Special Defenses, Personal Ki Feats and the Melee Weapon, including Melee Weapon Strength Modifier, of Target Enemy model as if they were printed on its own card until the end of the current action. Any feats used cost 0 Ki.

fields.name: Grip of the Void
fields.description: Targeted model gains one Immobilised Marker.

fields.name: Rend Soul
fields.description: This model gains a Melee Strength bonus equal to X for the next Damage Roll this turn, where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 3.

fields.name: Instil Envy
fields.description: Target model cannot use Ki Feats that Target Friendly models other than itself and can only declare actions that Target Enemy models if the Target has a higher Rice Cost than itself (Treat no Rice Cost as zero). This effect lasts until the End Phase.

fields.name: Unleash Envy
fields.description: Summon and Deploy an Envy within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Envy's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Envy in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Envy in play.

fields.name: Instil Sloth
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains Slow until the End Phase. If the Target declares a Ranged or Melee Action it may not make the usual Walk associated with that action.

fields.name: Unleash Sloth
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Sloth within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sloth's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Sloth in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sloth in play.

fields.name: Instil Wrath
fields.description: Target Enemy model becomes Berserk until the End Phase.

fields.name: Unleash Wrath
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Wrath within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Wrath's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Wrath in play in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Wrath in play.

fields.name: Master's Call
fields.description: Summon a Small Swarm of Rats by Deploying it in BtB with Gendo or another Small Swarm of Rats. After Deploying the Small Swarm of Rats in BtB with this model you may remove this model and place it Elsewhere. The Small Swarm of Rats may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. A Small Swarm of Rats may not be placed if there is no free Wound Track on the Small Swarm of Rat's profile card.

fields.name: Many as One
fields.description: This model and a Friendly 'Animal - Rat' model switch places. This feat may be used while this model is Elsewhere.

fields.name: Fresh Meat
fields.description: Target Friendly Kairai loses Slow until the End Phase.

fields.name: Cloud of Flies
fields.description: Enemy models in, or entering the Aura's area of effect gain a Stunned Marker. Models can only gain one Stunned Marker per turn as a result of this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Enveloping Mists
fields.description: The  Aura's area is considered a [Normal, Obscuring, Huge] terrain element and Friendly Kairai in the Aura gain Tireless.

fields.name: Pestilence
fields.description: All models within 3" gain a Poison (1) Marker and a Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Dark Fire
fields.description: Target gains X Fire (1) Markers.

fields.name: Look into the Void
fields.description: Target Enemy model which has LoS to this model, make a Success Level 4 Damage Roll on the Target model. Wounds caused by this Ki Feat ignore Armour. A model can only be Targeted by this feat (from any source) once per turn.

fields.name: Touch the Void
fields.description: When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, before the Damage Roll spend X Ki Tokens. X may not be greater than 3. For each Ki Token spent, prevent one Wound. For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers one Wound, ignoring Tough.

fields.name: Overwhelm
fields.description: This model gains Co-ordinated Attack (Kairai) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Will of Yurei
fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (

fields.name: Memories of Life
fields.description: This model loses Insignificant until the current activation is complete.

fields.name: Enliven
fields.description: This model loses Slow until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Capture Soul
fields.description: When a non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model is Killed, replace it with an Exhausted and Prone non-unique Kairai under your Control in the model's former location.

fields.name: Craft Marionette
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Marionette anywhere within 2" of this model and not in an Enemy model's ZoC. The Marionette receives a number of Ki Tokens equal to the X spent instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. This model cannot use 'Craft Marionette' if there is already a Marionette in this Warband.

fields.name: Prayer of Undeath
fields.description: Target Kairai receives a bonus of X to the final result of its next Rise Test this turn where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 2.

fields.name: Mortal Corruption
fields.description: Target gains X Poison (1) Markers.

fields.name: Rankiryu
fields.description: Models in the Pulse that have been Placed this activation gain a Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Curse of Stinging Needles
fields.description: Target model gains Tough (-1).

fields.name: Fog
fields.description: The Aura's area is considered a [Normal, Obscuring, Huge] terrain element.

fields.name: Soul Fire
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains a number of Fire (1) Markers equal to the Success Level of the Test +1 and a Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Grasping Shadows
fields.description: This model gains Split Attack until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Weight of Shadows
fields.description: This model gains Strong until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Morph
fields.description: Until this model uses the Ki Feat Morph again this model gains either a Ki Feat, Base Statistic, Statistic Ki Boost, or Trait of an Enemy model in BtB, as if it were printed on its card.

fields.name: Shrine Desecration
fields.description: Deploy a Desecrated Shrine in BtB with this model. It is a 30mm base, Clear - Normal, Destructible terrain piece with Believer [Shugenja](

fields.name: Corrupt Essence
fields.description: Target Enemy Exhausted model gains 1 Control Marker and Disturb Flow (

fields.name: From Below...
fields.description: Deploy a non-Unique Gashadokuro model in BtB with this model but not in an Enemy model's ZoC.

fields.name: Sacrifice
fields.description: Remove Target Friendly, non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model that you own from play. If you do, add 4 Ki Tokens to the Yuta of Yurei card.

fields.name: Seed of Destruction
fields.description: Place 2 Seed Counters on Target Enemy model. Remove a Seed Counter each time the model activates, when the last Seed Counter is removed centre a 2" Pulse on the Target, deal 8 Damage split evenly (rounded down) between Enemy models in the Pulse. This model may not use this Ki Feat while any Enemy model has Seed Counters.

fields.name: Corrupting Shomyo
fields.description: Enemy models within the Aura that spend any number of Ki Tokens gain 1 Control Marker after their current activation is complete.

fields.name: Steal Vitality
fields.description: Target Enemy model loses an Activation Counter. Choose a Friendly model within 6, that model gains an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Eyes of Yurei
fields.description: This model gains Sixth Sense until the End Phase.

fields.name: Chaos Bolt
fields.description: Target model gains a Poison 1, Bleed 1 and Fire 1 Marker.

fields.name: Unholy Vitality
fields.description: Target model takes half its remaining Wounds, ignoring Durable (Rounded down) then gains a Activation Counter. lf used on an Enemy model you must succeed in an opposed Ki Test.

fields.name: Swallow Whole
fields.description: This feat must be declared before Initiative is determined in a Melee Exchange. If this model's Attack is successful, place the Enemy model Elsewhere.  Affected Enemy models suffer one Wound (ignoring Tough) if they are Elsewhere in the End Phase. For each Wound taken, this model gains 1 Ki Token.  When this model is removed from play for any reason, first place any affected models in BtB with this model. If this model is not on the Battlefield when it is removed from play, affected models gain Flank and return to play using that rule.

fields.name: Instil Gluttony
fields.description: Target model gains a Control Marker and, while it has any Control Markers from this Ki Feat, the Target gains the following Weapon: Gluttonous Maw: Melee Strength (-1) This model must always choose to use this weapon in a Melee Exchange. At the end of an Activation during which this model dealt Damage with this Weapon, it does not remove a Control Marker.

fields.name: Unleash Gluttony
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Gluttony within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Gluttony's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Gluttony in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Gluttony in play.

fields.name: Cobra Strike
fields.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the End Phase.

fields.name: Asp Strike
fields.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Darkness
fields.description: Until the End Phase all Non-Soulless, Non-Sixth Sense, Non-Bakemono models may only draw LoS up to 4".

fields.name: Military Training
fields.description: This model's Controller gains a Pass Token.

fields.name: Do Kote
fields.description: This model gains Feint (1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Mob Mentality
fields.description: When a Bakemono model passes a Fear Test, it does not need to re-roll that test due to Cowardly. This Ki Feat may be used after the dice are rolled, as if it were granting a re-roll. X is equal to the number of times this feat has been used previously this turn.

fields.name: Precision Strike
fields.description: This model's weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.description: If this model is out of LoS of all enemy models, place it within 3" of it's current location.

fields.name: Summon From the Shadows
fields.description: Deploy a Horde Bakemono anywhere within 2" of this model. If there are no Bakemono cards available with a free wound track this feat cannot be used. This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.

fields.name: Sweep
fields.description: This model gains Sweep Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Umbrella Block
fields.description: This model gains Parry (1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange

fields.name: Lurker
fields.description: This model gains Camouflage (2) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Death Sentence
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains a Death Sentence Marker.

fields.name: Quick Reload
fields.description: Remove any Reload Markers from this model.

fields.name: Grapple
fields.description: This model gains Grapple Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Cleave
fields.description: This model gains Brutal (2) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Obey
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains one Control Marker.

fields.name: Inspiration
fields.description: Target Friendly Faction model with a Rice Cost of less than this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

fields.name: Rally
fields.description: Remove the Frightened state from all Friendly models in the Pulse.

fields.name: Fend
fields.description: This model gains Push Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Mutation
fields.description: This model gains one of the following until the End Phase: • +1 Melee Weapon Strength • Regenerate (2) • Armour (+1)

fields.name: Hack
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Powerful Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Rend
fields.description: This model gains Brutal (+1) until the current action is resolved. This model may only use this Feat once per Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Pathfinder
fields.description: Target Friendly model gains Lightfooted until the End Phase.

fields.name: Detect
fields.description: Choose a model in the Pulse. That model loses Camouflage until the End Phase.

fields.name: Quagmire
fields.description: The Aura's area is considered [Difficult, Clear, Zero] terrain.

fields.name: Distraction
fields.description: Target Enemy model must perform a Ki Challenge Test (6). If it fails you may change that model's Facing.

fields.name: Hail of Steel
fields.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (3) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Chanyou
fields.description: Remove all Berserk, Blind, Death Sentence, Diseased, Fire, Impetuous, Poison, Spirit Block, and Stunned Markers from this model.

fields.name: Consume Soul
fields.description: When an enemy model is Killed within 3" of this model, this model may Heal X Wounds, where X is equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.

fields.name: Vitality
fields.description: This model gains an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Dirty Fighting
fields.description: Enemy models cannot declare the use of Special Attacks or Defences in Melee Exchanges with this model until the current activation is resolved.

fields.name: Snare
fields.description: When an Enemy model without Cloudwalk or Intangible, and not in BtB with a Friendly model, declares a Move in the Pulse, that model must make a Move Challenge Test (X). X is 8 for models declaring a Run or Charge Action. X is 7 otherwise. If it fails the model may not Move; if it was declaring an action, it loses an Activation Counter and its action is considered resolved.  This is a Trap effect.

fields.name: Mountain Gale
fields.description: Untilthe End Phase, whilst this model is in play, models making Ranged Attacks suffer a +2 modifier to the Target Number of Ranged Attack Tests.

fields.name: Wing Buffet
fields.description: All models in the Pulse's area of effect must succeed in a Size Challenge Test (6) or be Moved D3" directly away from this model.

fields.name: Dash
fields.description: This model gains Agile and Evasive until the end of the current activation, and may also move 2" at the end of its activation.

fields.name: Blade Finesse
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Pierce (2) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Nomenclature
fields.description: Target Enemy Disguised model.

fields.name: Spirit Guardian
fields.description: When a Friendly model within the Pulse's area of effect is Targeted by an Enemy model's Ki Feat, change the Target to this model. Range is measured to the original Target.

fields.name: Raijin's Rage
fields.description: When this model makes a successful Ranged Attack, after that Attack is resolved but before its activation ends it may make an additional Ranged Attack against another model within 3" of the last model Targeted. This Ranged Attack is considered to be in the Medium Range Band and ignores Range, LoS, and Camouflage.

fields.name: Tenacious
fields.description: This model gains Tough (+1) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Stagger
fields.description: This model gains Ranged Defence (1) and Sidestep Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Perfect Defence
fields.description: This model gains Impenetrable Defence until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Defensive Stroke
fields.description: This model gains Parry (+1) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Unassailable
fields.description: This model gains Indomitable (+2) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Dead Eye
fields.description: Until the end of the activation this model ignores Cover and Tiny modifiers to Ranged Attacks. The Opposing Player may not nominate a new Target for this Ranged Attack.

fields.name: Mirage
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it entered into BtB with, or Targets this model with a Ranged Attack or Ki Feat, but before any Melee Exchange begins; place this model within 2" of its current location, the Enemy model's action is then considered resolved.

fields.name: Apparition
fields.description: Place this model within 2" of its current location.

fields.name: Ten-Uchi
fields.description: This model's weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Vital Strike
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (2) until the current activation is resolved.

fields.name: Prediction
fields.description: This model's Controller's Opponent must declare which model they will choose as their next Activating model. If the model becomes ineligible before it is chosen as the Activating model then another model can be chosen without restriction.

fields.name: Fog of Hesitation
fields.description: One model within the Pulse may not be chosen as the Activating model until all other models in its Warband are Exhausted.

fields.name: Veteran
fields.description: This model does not suffer Melee dice penalties due to States until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

fields.name: Mountain Stance
fields.description: This model gains Immovable until the End Phase.

fields.name: Conditioning
fields.description: This model gains Resistance (2) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Mighty Blow
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Strong for the next Damage Roll.

fields.name: Gang
fields.description: This model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Ashigaru] until the End Phase.

fields.name: Circular Strike
fields.description: This model gains Aware until the end of this activation, then makes a Ranged Attack against each other model (Friendly or Enemy) in Range and LoS, in any order and ignoring Camouflage. These Attacks are not affected by the penalty for having made Ranged Attacks previously in the turn and do not roll the test if the target is in BtB with an Enemy model.

fields.name: Cleansing
fields.description: Remove up to X Control, Disease, Fire, Poison, or Spirit Block Markers from models with tha Pulse's area of effect. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens spent.

fields.name: Warding Shomyo
fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (

fields.name: Iaijutsu
fields.description: This model's weapons gain Reach until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Total Loyalty
fields.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Samurai, Shisai](2") until the End Phase.

fields.name: Idolise
fields.description: Target Friendly Faction model with a Rice Cost of more than this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

fields.name: Alert
fields.description: Target model gains Aware and Ranged Defence (1) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Dominate
fields.description: Target non-Exhausted Enemy model must be chosen to activate next, ignoring Impetuous Markers. The Opposing Player may not declare the use of a Pass Token next activation.

fields.name: Chudan
fields.description: This model's Special Attacks and Defences are reduced to (0) cost until the End Phase.

fields.name: Forestall
fields.description: Target Enemy model may not declare Scenario Actions this turn.

fields.name: Vicious Strike
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (+1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Precision Shot
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Binding Roots
fields.description: Choose up to X Enemy models within the Pulse's area of effect. Each model chosen becomes Immobilised.

fields.name: Savage Beating
fields.description: This model gains Combo Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: War Cry
fields.description: This model gains Fear (6) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Tornado
fields.description: When a Friendly model within 2" is the Target of a failed Ranged Attack, immediately make a Ranged Attack. The Range Bands, Strength bonus and any applicable traits or unique effects on the model which failed the Ranged Attack are used instead of any such traits or effects on this model. This model ignores the effects of Ammo and Reload traits while resolving this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Batter
fields.description: Until the End Phase, models Wounded by this model's Melee Attack gain a Stun Marker.

fields.name: Sick Em!
fields.description: When Friendly Animal models Target or participate in a Melee Exchange with chosen Enemy model, they gain Bravery and Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.

fields.name: Crushing Blow
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Brutal (+1) and Pierce (2) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Curse Fate
fields.description: Roll a number of D6 equal to 1 plus the SL of the Opposed Ki Test. Reroll 1s and dice with the same value until all dice have unique values. Until the End Phase the Target considers any dice it rolls that match those rolled for this feat to be a value of 1.

fields.name: Chain Attack
fields.description: This model gains Combo Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Spur On
fields.description: Until the End Phase Target Friendly Animal model gains Rise (4) and loses the Aloof trait.

fields.name: Loyalty
fields.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Friendly](1") until the End Phase.

fields.name: Flow Like Water
fields.description: This model gains Dodge(1) and Counterstrike Defence(0) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Rain of Blows
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Combo Attack (0) and Lightning Reflexes until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Battle Stations
fields.description: This model gains Order [Ashigaru](

fields.name: Vault
fields.description: This model gains Cloudwalk until the End Phase.

fields.name: Strafe
fields.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (2) until the until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Far Throw
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon Range Bands become

fields.name: Rampage
fields.description: This model gains Agile and Indomitable (1) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Hyper Regeneration
fields.description: This model gains Regenerate (4) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Thrash
fields.description: Models in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Psychic Drain
fields.description: Transfer up to 3 Ki Tokens from the Target Enemy model's profile card to this card.

fields.name: Psychic Venom
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains X Poison (2) Markers. X may not be greater than 3.

fields.name: Future Sight
fields.description: This model gains Tactician (1) until the End Phase and Enemy models lose Tactician until the End Phase.

fields.name: Athleticism
fields.description: This model gains Jump Up and Dodge (1) until the current activation is resolved.

fields.name: Acrobatics
fields.description: This model gains Agil, Defensive, and Dodge (+1) until the end of this activation.

fields.name: Thresher
fields.description: This model gains Indomitable (1) and Split Attack until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Overrule
fields.description: Target non-Exhausted Enemy model gains an Impetuous Marker.

fields.name: Escape
fields.description: When this model Kills an Enemy model, once the action is complete, this model may make a Walk.

fields.name: Spirit Ward
fields.description: While within this Aura, Kami and Asura models cannot move closer to this model.

fields.name: Healing Touch
fields.description: Target Friendly model in BtB Heals X wounds.

fields.name: Heed My Word
fields.description: Perform a Walk with the Target model. If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.

fields.name: Lure
fields.description: Target model not in BtB with a Friendly model gains an Impetuous Marker, must declare a Walk Action as its next activation, and must move directly towards this model with its full move changing its facing so that this model is in LoS. If unable to perform a Walk Action, it may activate without restriction.

fields.name: Sneak
fields.description: This model gains Evasive and Lightfooted until the End Phase.

fields.name: Hypnotic Gaze
fields.description: Target enemy model loses an Activation Counter and gains one Stunned Marker.

fields.name: Inferno
fields.description: All other models within the Pulse's area of effect gain a Fire (2) Marker.

fields.name: Smite
fields.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is resolved.

fields.name: Yoko-Men
fields.description: Models involved in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Martyr
fields.description: Transfer X State Markers that are not Disguise, Held, Prone, or Reload Markers from a model in the Pulse to this model.

fields.name: Practised Manoeuvres
fields.description: When applying Melee Assist penalties for a Melee Exchange involving Lone Swordsmen, this model inflicts -2 dice rather than -1 until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.

fields.name: Fire Spin
fields.description: Move this model 4" in a straight line in any direction. Any model within 2" of this model at any point in its path gains a Fire (2) Marker. Until the End Phase, whilst this model is in play, models making Ranged Attacks suffer a +1 modifier to the Challenge Number of Ranged Attack Tests. In the next Starting Phase, the player who wins the Tactical Test moves this model 4" in a straight line in any direction, then the other player moves him 2" in a straight line in any direction. Any model within 2" of this model at any point in its path gains a Fire (2) Marker then this effect ends.

fields.name: Stand Behind Me!
fields.description: This model grants Cover as if it were terrain until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Headshot
fields.description: Target model's Ranged Weapons gain Critical Attack (0) against Enemy Kairai models.

fields.name: Passing Strike
fields.description: If this model moved into Melee this Activation, it may make a normal Damage Roll when resolving a successful Sidestep Attack.

fields.name: Tsukkakaru
fields.description: This model gains Banzai! until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Spirit Absolution
fields.description: This model loses Soulless, Slow, Tough, and Rise. This effect expires in the End Phase. Target model not in BtB with a Friendly model gains an Impetous Marker, must declare a Walk action as its next activation, and must move directly towards this model with its full Move Statistic, changing facing so that this model is in LoS. If unable to perform a Walk action, it may activate without restriction.

fields.name: Tsunami
fields.description: Enemy models in the Pulse must pass a Size Challenge Test (7), or be moved directly away from this Riku until they hit an Impassable terrain feature, a model which passes its Size Challenge Test or until they have moved 8". If another model is contacted by models being moved by this feat, it must make a Size Challenge (6) Test or be pushed along with the original model.

fields.name: Hope
fields.description: Target Friendly Villager or Peasant model may re-roll one die from any test or Damage Roll until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Allure
fields.description: Enemy models in the Aura that allocate dice to Attack against this model in a Melee Exchange gain 1 Control Marker after the activation is complete unless the Attack Kills or removes this model from play.

fields.name: Envelop
fields.description: When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, after the activation is complete, the Enemy model becomes Immobilised.

fields.name: Flame Whip
fields.description: During an Enemy model's Activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Fire (2) Marker. A model may only gain one Fire Marker per activation as a result of this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Blood in the Water
fields.description: Taget model gains a Bleed (1) Marker.

fields.name: Reanimate
fields.description: This model may re-roll a failed Rise Test.

fields.name: Skewer
fields.description: When an Enemy model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange with this model, it may not move except to change facing until the End Phase.

fields.name: Second Wind
fields.description: At the end of an activation in which this model declared a Charge action and caused Wounds in a Melee Exchange it gains an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Barge
fields.description: After a Melee action declared by this model is resolved, move Enemy models in BtB directly away from this model until they leave this model's ZoC and then move this model directly towards one of those Enemy models until it contact that model.

fields.name: Improvise
fields.description: Your opponent may not use Instant or Active Effects until the end of the current Activation. Apply any one non-Exceptional Special Attack and any one non-Exceptional Special Defence to this model's Melee Exchange at no cost this Activation.This model can only use these Special Abilities this activation. After the activation ends, this model may Move up to its Move Statistic in inches.

fields.name: Kawasu
fields.description: Enemy models cannot declare the use of Special Attacks and Defences in Melee Exchanges with this model until the current activation is resolved.

fields.name: Duty
fields.description: This model loses Insignificant until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Flame Arrows
fields.description: Deploy a 50mm base on the table within LoS and within 15" of this model. Until the End Phase the area of the base is [Normal, Blocking, Large] terrain. This feat cannot be used while this model has a Reload Marker. This model gains a Reload Marker.

fields.name: Hold the Line!
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Ashigaru model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route. If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

fields.name: Uncloak
fields.description: Use this feat... • in the Starting Phase or • when this model is Targeted by an Enemy effect or • an Enemy model declares an action or resolves an effect that will bring it into BtB with this model ...while this model is undamaged. Replace this model with a Loyal Samurai you own that is currently Elsewhere, and place this model Elsewhere. This model gains the Flank trait and returns to play using those rules.  If the Enemy Model initiated a Melee Exchange, it is now Surprised. Transfer State Markers, Activation Counters and any tokens to the Samurai's profile card.

fields.name: Deference
fields.description: When an Enemy non-Samurai, non-Ashigaru model declares an action which will either bring it into BtB with this model, or Targets this model with a Ranged Attack or Ki Feat, it must make a Challenge (5) Ki Test. If the Enemy model is successful resolve the Action as normal. If unsuccessful its activation ends before any movement and it removes an Activation Counter.  This is a Trap effect.

fields.name: Keiro
fields.description: Target Friendly Samurai model with a Rice Cost of more than this model gains +1 to its Melee pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

fields.name: Move It!
fields.description: This model's Controller chooses up to 3 other Friendly Ashigaru models within the Pulse's area of effect. Those models immediately perform a Walk up to their Move stat in inches.

fields.name: Awe
fields.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain a Frightened Marker.

fields.name: Precision
fields.description: This model's Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Nuki Do
fields.description: When this model does not have the Initiative, it gains +1 Melee Pool, Dodge (+1), and Defensive until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Suri-Ashi
fields.description: After a Melee Exchange is complete, this model may move away from the Enemy model until it leaves its ZoC, at which point its movement ends.

fields.name: Eagle Eye
fields.description: The Medium Ranged Band of this model's Ranged Weapon is unlimited until the end of the current action.

fields.name: Ape
fields.description: When another Friendly Monk model in the pulse ends its activation you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation. If you do, this model must declare the same action as that Monk and gains a Non-Exceptional, Special Attack or Defence from that Monk until the action is complete. If the cost of the Special is 0 it becomes 1.

fields.name: Simian Trickery
fields.description: If Niseru is within 6" of this model choose: • Place Niseru in BtB with this model. If this model is in BtB with an Enemy model, Niseru must also be placed in Bt with at least 1 Enemy model. • Place this model in BtB with Niseru. If Niseru is in BtB with an Enemy model, this model must also be placed in BtB with at least 1 Enemy model.

fields.name: Firm Resolve
fields.description: When a Friendly Suzume model in the Pulse fails a Fear Test, it gains Steadfast until the end of the current Activation.

fields.name: Dart
fields.description: Move this model its Move Statistic in inches.

fields.name: Slice
fields.description: Until the end of this activation, this model's Kama weapon gains Bleed (

fields.name: Hot Shot
fields.description: This model's Arquebus weapon gains Fire (

fields.name: Hayai
fields.description: While this model is involved in a Melee Exchange, your Opponent may not use Instant or Active Effects. This effect ends once the current activation is complete. This feat always resolves before other Instant or Active Effects, regardless of the usual Active Player Rules Conflict resolution and can be used to prevent an Enemy model using a declared feat (No Enemy resources are expended).

fields.name: Debana
fields.description: After causing Damage in a Melee Exchange this model may move away from the Defender until it leaves its ZoC, at which point its movement ends.

fields.name: Storm Manipulation
fields.description: When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the Ranged Attack Action is resolved: • This model's Ranged Weapon's range bands become

fields.name: Multitudes
fields.description: Until the End Phase, if this model is Killed, replace it by Summoning and Deploying an available non-Unique, non-Rinsho, Horde Bakemono with 1 Wound box unmarked. Then Summon and Deploy an available non-Unique, non-Rinsho, Horde Bakemono in BtB with that model with 1 Wound box unmarked.

fields.name: Blazing Maelstrom
fields.description: Until the end of the current activation: • this model gains Cloudwalk, +2 Move Statistic and • this model's Bujutsu Weapon gains +1 Strength and Fire (+

fields.name: Shiatzu
fields.description: Remove one Berserk, Control, Frightened, Impetuous, Spirit Block or Stunned Marker from Target Non-Animal model.

fields.name: Envigorate
fields.description: Target Friendly Non-Soulless, Non-Animal model gains an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Sound the Advance!
fields.description: Friendly Loyal models in the Pulse gain Fear (6) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Insight
fields.description: This model gains Tactician (+1) for the next Tactical Test. This model automatically wins Tie Breaks on Tactical Tests until the End Phase.

fields.name: Quick March
fields.description: All Friendly Ashigaru within the Aura ignore the melee penalty for having Run.

fields.name: Ancestral Armour
fields.description: The next Enemy Damage Roll on this model is ignored if the individual dice values of the Damage Roll are the same number.

fields.name: Ghost Fire
fields.description: Transfer 1 Ki Token from all models in the Pulse to this model, each model that transferred a Ki Token suffers 1 Wound. Wounds caused by this effect ignore Tough. X is equal to the number of Ghost Tokens on this model.

fields.name: Encourage
fields.description: Target other Friendly model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase.

fields.name: Reputation
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker. This Ki Feat may only be used once per model in any activation.

fields.name: Supplies
fields.description: Remove a Reload Marker from, or and an Ammo Token to, a model in the Pulse.

fields.name: Prayer of Healing
fields.description: This model may Target any model within the Aura with its Heal trait.

fields.name: Soothing Shomyo
fields.description: Models in the Aura gain Immune [Berserk]. When rolling a Damage Roll against a Friendly model within the Aura, after the result is determined, roll an additional dice and then choose 1 dice to remove, use the remaining 2 dice for the Damage Roll.

fields.name: Shadow Arts
fields.description: This model gains Lightfooted and Assassin until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Shroud
fields.description: Enemy models that are not in the Aura cannot draw LoS to models completely inside the Aura. Models completely in the Aura do not block Enemy model's LoS.

fields.name: Coin
fields.description: Friendly non-Kami Ronin models in the Aura when this Ki Feat is used gain 1 Ki Token. Models in the Aura gain Bodyguard [Haiboku](3").

fields.name: Alacrity
fields.description: This model gains an additional Activation Counter. An Enemy model may cancel this Ki Feat by spending 1 Ki Token, this model gains that Ki Token, and the Ki Feat has no other effect but is still considered to have been used this turn.

fields.name: Chill
fields.description: Target Enemy model in BtB gains Slow until the End Phase.

fields.name: To the Front!
fields.description: Friendly Bushi models in the Aura do not suffer the Melee Penalty for having Run.

fields.name: Defensive Line
fields.description: Until the End Phase, while in BtB with another Friendly Tengu Bushi, this model and ├èFriendly Tengu Bushi in BtB with this model gain Parry (+1). A model can only benefit from this feat once, though it does stack with other sources of Parry.

fields.name: Storm Path
fields.description: When this model Runs or Charges this activation, any model moved through gains a Stunned Marker and a Fire (1) Marker. During this movement, this model may move through Destructible terrain. If it does, remove the terrain from the battlefield.

fields.name: Surge
fields.description: Call Lightning Ranged Attacks gain +1 Strength and Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is complete.

fields.name: Cannon Manipulation
fields.description: When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved: • This model's Cannon Weapon gains Slam Attack (0). • Draw a line between this model and the Target model. Any model the line crosses and any model within 1" of those models gain a Fire (2) Marker. • If the attack is successful, centre a 2" Pulse on the Target model. Models within the Pulse suffer a Damage Roll with the same Success Level as the Target model and gain a Stunned Marker.

fields.name: Rangefinder
fields.description: Deploy a Signal Flag in BtB with this model if one is available.

fields.name: All-In
fields.description: Before a Damage Roll on this model, this model's Controller may flip a coin and call heads or tails. If they call successfully, this model instead takes no damage. Otherwise, this model takes normal damage. This feat may only be used once per Damage Roll.

fields.name: Gambler's Ruin
fields.description: Until the End Phase, when Target model performs a Test, their Controller rolls an additional die. This model's Controller must remove a dice of their choice from that Test before it is resolved. For a Melee Exchange, this occurs after dice allocation is revealed. The additional dice may be Attack or Defence and the removed dice must be of the same type.

fields.name: Tidal Flow
fields.description: Use this Ki Feat at the start of any Activation. Move this model up to 4" towards an Enemy table edge (any edge which touches an enemy deployment zone). At the end of this Activation, Move this model 4" towards the opposite table edge.

fields.name: Ire
fields.description: Target Enemy model becomes Berserk until the end of its next activation. While Berserk, it treats all models as Enemy models. Until the End Phase, this model gains 1 Ki Token for each Wound caused by the Target in a Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Illusion
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains a Blind marker.

fields.name: Seduction
fields.description: If this model is successful the Targeted model gains Stupid until the End Phase.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.description: Replace this model with its other form (Fox Form

fields.name: Restitution
fields.description: Until the End Phase, Target Friendly model with a Control Marker gains +1 to its Melee Pool and Ranged Pool while it has a Control Marker.

fields.name: Rectifying Shomyo
fields.description: When a Friendly model kills a Kami model in a Melee Exchange while in the Aura, you may replace the Kami by Summoning and Deploying a Friendly, 8 Rice Cost Kami with identical Elemental Icons. If the Enemy has no Elemental Icons, you may replace it with a Void Kami.

fields.name: Dharma
fields.description: When Target, non-Exhausted model next activates, you may choose a valid Simple Action for it to perform. The model's Controller must resolve the chosen Action. If the Target does not Activate before the End Phase, this effect expires.

fields.name: Final Verdict
fields.description: Your Opponent must choose either a Death Sentence marker or a Control Marker. Target Enemy model gains one of the chosen Marker.

fields.name: Kannagara
fields.description: Until the End Phase, if Target Enemy modeldeclares an action other than Focus it gains a Control Marker once the action is resolved, unless it has a Control Marker when the action is declared.

fields.name: Inari's Luck
fields.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse makes a Test or a Damage Roll, it may reroll one of its own dice in that test or roll. Dice may only be rerolled once due to this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Requiem
fields.description: Kairai models cannot be Deployed in the Aura. Models in the Aura cannot be Replaced with Kairai models.

fields.name: Majesty
fields.description: While within the Aura, each inch moved counts as 2 incehs for any Enemy model's movement. This model cannot be Targeted by Enemy Effects, and Enemy models cannot enter BtB with this model.

fields.name: Shadow
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation when it begins a movement in the Pulse, once the movement is completed this model may Walk up to its Move towards that model's final position.

fields.name: Intercept
fields.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse is selected for a Melee Action or targeted by a Charge Action, this model becomes the new selected or targeted model. If the Enemy model has enough movement to reach the original model, it is instead moved into BtB with this model by the shortest route, regardless of its actual movement.

fields.name: Hunt
fields.description: Target Friendly model gains Tireless until the End Phase.

fields.name: Absolute Mastery
fields.description: For each model that would cause a Melee Assist Penalty on this model (even if it is ignored by the Indomitable trait), this model gains +1 Melee Pool and +1 Melee Weapon Strength until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Linked Swords
fields.description: This model gains Reach and its Hook Swords Weapon gains Chain Weapon (1) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Pin Weapon
fields.description: Before the Enemy model chooses a Weapon to use in a Melee Exchange, choose a Weapon they have access to. For the rest of the current activation, replace that Weapon on the Enemy model's card with: Unarmed (-2 Melee Strength, no Traits, no Specials).

fields.name: Bless
fields.description: A Friendly Unblessed model in BtB gains the Blessing of Steel Enhancement - Equipment card if permitted.

fields.name: Empower
fields.description: While Target Friendly Metal Kami is within 6" of an Enemy model, Friendly models with no other Friendly models within 3" of them gain Armour (X). X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on the Kami.

fields.name: Irokane Protection
fields.description: Target model gains Fear (4) and Weapons used in Attacks made against that model gain Pierce (-2) (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Kote Men
fields.description: This model gains Feint (+1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Taunt
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains Aggressive until the End Phase.

fields.name: Admirable
fields.description: Friendly Juhin, Kaizoku, and Kancho models in the Aura gain Spirit (1).

fields.name: Long Throw
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become

fields.name: Agility
fields.description: After making a Scenario Action, this model gains an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Enthusiasm
fields.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (3) until the end of the current activation. During a Ranged Attack Action, for each Ranged Attack that has already been successful this activation, this model's Bombs Weapon increases its long range by 2".

fields.name: Dragon's Focus
fields.description: This model gains Mettle (1) until the end of the current activation.

fields.name: Dragon's Presence
fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (

fields.name: Choke Hold
fields.description: This model gains Grapple Attack (0) and Grapple Defence (0) until the end of the current activation. If this model successfully applies one of these Special Abilities, the Enemy model suffers one Wound.

fields.name: Cauterise
fields.description: Remove any Disease and Bleed Markers from the Target model.

fields.name: Kill or Cure
fields.description: Target model that you own makes a Ki Challenge Test (5). If successful, unmark all Wound boxes. If it fails, the Target is Killed.

fields.name: Hoarfrost
fields.description: After a Melee Exchange with this model is complete, Target Enemy model becomes Held.

fields.name: Brawn
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon gains Brutal (1) and Reload (+1).

fields.name: Elders' Aegis
fields.description: Choose a State other than Reloading. Target model gains Immune [Chosen State] until the End Phase.

fields.name: Flitter
fields.description: This first time this turn an Enemy model Moves into BtB with this model, place this model within 2" of its current location, but not into an Enemy model's ZoC.

fields.name: Fujin's Will
fields.description: Friendly models with Cloudwalk that are within the Pulse may be placed within 2" of their current position. This feat does not affect models in BtB with Enemy models. Models cannot be pplaced into an Enemy ZoC.

fields.name: Slipstream
fields.description: When this model Runs this activation, it may Move through other Friendly models. It may not end its Move occupying the same area as an Impassable Terrain element or another model. Any model moved through can Move 1".

fields.name: Voice of the Wind
fields.description: Place Target Model within 1" of its current location. If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.

fields.name: Eye Peck
fields.description: When this model causes Damage with its Bird Strike Weapon, the Target gains a Blind Marker.

fields.name: Nerve Strike
fields.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model would make a Damage Roll in a Melee Exchange, instead the Enemy model removes an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Weight of Shadows
fields.description: This model gains Strong until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Shadow Crows
fields.description: Place the Conjured Shadow Crows template in BtB with this model.

fields.name: Threat
fields.description: Enemy models ending a move in the Aura or Placed into the Aura must turn to directly face this model. This Model loses Camouflage while using this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Pinprick
fields.description: When using this model's Blowgun weapon, instead of rolling a Damage Roll, you may choose to inflict 1 Damage ignoring Tough.

fields.name: Strangulation
fields.description: This model's Garrotte Weapon gains Critical Attack (0) and Powerful Attack (0).

fields.name: Goh
fields.description: For the next Rope Dart Ranged attack, if successful, move the target Small or Tiny model directly toward this model until it contacts impassable terrain or any model.

fields.name: Insurgent
fields.description: This Feat can only be used while this model is Elsewhere. When an Enemy model deploys using the Flank Trait, this model may ignore its current deployment choices for its Flank Trait and deploy within 3" of the Enemy model but not in its ZoC or BtB. This model generates two Activation Counters when Deployed using this Feat.

fields.name: Entice
fields.description: Perform a Walk with Target Enemy model directly toward this model equal to its Move statistic in inches. At the end of the Walk the Enemy model must directly face this model.

fields.name: Warning Rattle
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Frightened Marker. Remove the Frightened Marker in the End Phase.

fields.name: Dragon's Awe
fields.description: This model gains Believer [Shisai] (

fields.name: Rage
fields.description: Use this Ki Feat during the Starting Phase. This model gains a Berserk Marker and gains Strong until the End Phase.

fields.name: Grasp of Darkness
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains Slow and Weak until the End Phase.

fields.name: Bloodletting
fields.description: Target Friendly Oni in BtB suffers one Wound ignoring Armour and Tough. This model gains an Oni Blood Token.

fields.name: Call the Horde
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Horde Bakemono in BtB with this model. If there are no Bakemono cards available with a free Wound Track this feat cannot be used.

fields.name: Council's Shield
fields.description: Targte Bakemono gains an additional X unmarked Wound boxes until the End Phase. Mark Wounds on these Wound boxes first. X cannot be greater than 3.

fields.name: Curse of Doom
fields.description: Place 4 Doom Tokens on Target model. During the Starting Phase remove a Doom Token. When the last Doom Token is removed the model suffers 7 Wounds.

fields.name: Dark Summons
fields.description: Deploy any Oni or Onisho model that was not recruited by the Warband into play, exhausted, within 3" of this model with 3 Control Markers on it.  If the summoned model ever has zero Control Markers, remove it from play.

fields.name: Discordant Melody
fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (

fields.name: Frenzied Rythm
fields.description: Each Friendly Bakemono within the Pulse gains 1 Virtue Token.

fields.name: Heave
fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon Range Bands become

fields.name: Marching Beat
fields.description: All Bakemono not in BtB with an Enemy model within the Pulse's area of effect may make a 2" Walk.

fields.name: Mind Control
fields.description: Until the end of the current activation, if Target other Bakemono must make a Disguise or Fear Test, this model makes the Test instead. Target model may attempt the Disguise Test as if it had Ki Stat 2 or higher. While making Tests for the Target, this model gains Bravery and loses Cowardly.

fields.name: Pile On!
fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Bakemono model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route. If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.

fields.name: Reiji Kinoko
fields.description: Replace this model with the Zoo model. Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Zoo's profile card has the same number of Wounds marked as Xi-Han. Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any Tokens to Zoo's profile card, Zoo gains an Impetuous Marker.  When this effect expires in the End Phase, replace Zoo with Xi-Han. Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Xi-Han's profile has the same number of Wounds marked as Zoo. Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any tokens to Xi-Han's profile card.

fields.name: Shadow Tendrils
fields.description: Target Enemy model suffers -3 Move until the End Phase.

fields.name: Soul Thirst
fields.description: When an Enemy model is Killed within the Pulse, this model may Heal a number of Wounds and gain a number of Ki Tokens equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.

fields.name: Stolen Glory
fields.description: When a Friendly Onisho model deals damage in a Melee Exchange in the Pulse, if this model is not in BtB or an Enemy model's ZoC, once the Melee Exchange is resolved this model may immediately Charge the Enemy model. Neither model loses Activation Counters for this Charge or for participating in the Melee Exchange. If the Enemy model is removed from play only this model may use the Consume Soul Ki Feat this activation.

fields.name: Strip Soul
fields.description: Target Enemy model gains one Spirit Block Marker and Insignificant until the End Phase.  X is equal to the Ki Statistic of the Targeted Enemy model.

fields.name: Scuttle
fields.description: Move this model 1".

fields.name: Cower
fields.description: Until the End Phase Target Frightened Enemy model may only declare Disengage, Stand Up and Wait actions.

fields.name: Manifest Fear
fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Sagoya Kaidan within 3" of Target Enemy model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sagoya Kaidan's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play.

fields.name: Horrify
fields.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain a Frightened Marker. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.

fields.name: Thanatophobia
fields.description: Frightened models in the Pulse take a Success Level 2 Damage Roll. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.
